<title level="1" pfs="">[Quintessa Maray](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2314)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Quintessa Maray](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2314)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 314</row>

**Perception** +20

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _+1 [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_, mithral necklace worth 30 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +20 

</row>

**HP** 145

**Damsel Act** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** A critical hit is scored against Lady Quintessa; **Effect** Lady Quintessa exaggerates the impact of the blow, attempting to trick her foes into underestimating her as weak and frail. She makes a [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) attempt against the triggering creature. If she successfully performs her Damsel Act while she has an inspire courage composition active, the duration of that composition increases by 1 round.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+4 piercing

**Bard Spontaneous Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Glibness](/Spells.aspx?ID=135) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 30
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **6th**
[Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388)

**Quickened Casting** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) Frequency once per day; Effect If Quintessa's next action is to cast a bard cantrip or a bard spell that is 4th level or lower, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

**Signature Spells**   Quintessa can heighten the following spells freely: _dimension door, dispel magic, hallucination, soothe,_ and _vampiric touch._

</column>
name: Quintessa Maray
